attributes.action: Remove double yellow lines from Maine Road, Moss Side, Manchester.
attributes.background:
Maine Rd, Moss Side, Manchester was previously home to Manchester City Football Club 13 years ago. 

The area is now a residential street with many streets connected to it. 

The double yellow lines from the football ground have never been removed & residents are being fined for parking here.

rejection.details:
Controls over parking are the responsibility of local authorities (and not the UK Government or UK Parliament).  In this case, Manchester City Council is responsible for the parking restriction.

Manchester City Council has its own e-petition site, at 
http://petitions.manchester.gov.uk/petitions.ti

You may want to consider starting an e-petition there.
